meta.track_condition: Dirt: Fast, Turf: Firm, Tapeta: Fast

selections.name: Affirming
selections.reason: Significant class drop from MSW $84k to Maiden Claiming $25k. Previous turf effort (Speed 52) fits well here.

selections.name: Come On Poppi
selections.reason: Consistent runner at this level. 2nd last out with a competitive speed figure (55). Good post.

selections.name: Bint Mischief
selections.reason: Good recent form on Tapeta (2nd, Speed 57). Trainer Cibelli strikes at 33%.

selections.name: Bella Bello Banker
selections.reason: Flashy speed figure (77) at 5f turf two back. Dangerous if that speed carries to the mile.

danger_horse.name: Bella Bello Banker
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure outlier; if she clears early, she could steal it.

selections.name: Transactional Guy
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. aboard. Drops significantly from CLM $17.5k to $8k. Speed figures (57-62) are competitive.

selections.name: McMullen
selections.reason: Has run huge figures (106 in header, 70s in PPs) and won at this level/distance in September.

selections.name: Lamcaro
selections.reason: Consistent check-earner with speed figures in the high 60s/low 70s.

selections.name: Last Run
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last out at this level. Speed 69 fits.

selections.name: Noble Sky
selections.reason: Standout form. 2nd in MSW $84k last out with an 89 speed figure. Looks much the best in this small field.

selections.name: Cant Stop Munnings
selections.reason: Shipper with strong KY form (2nd in MSW $120k). The clear main danger.

selections.name: Wheelhouse
selections.reason: Consistent mid-60s speed figures. Best of the rest.

selections.name: Step Slow
selections.reason: 2nd last out in lower level maiden claimer.

selections.name: Road Mischief
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. + Victor Barboza (18%). Drops from MCL $35k to $17.5k. Should wake up.

selections.name: Losmastix
selections.reason: Ran a 62 speed figure last out (3rd). That number tops this field.

selections.name: Josh Ready
selections.reason: 2nd last out at this level. Consistent.

selections.name: Van Cleef
selections.reason: David Egan up. 5th last out but not beaten far.

selections.name: Nacho Problem
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. / Brad Cox. 3rd in this condition last out. Class of the field.

selections.name: Glancing My Way
selections.reason: Beat the top pick last time out. Must respect the win.

selections.name: Kate The Smate
selections.reason: 2nd to #2 last time. Consistent runner.

selections.name: Dolce Vino
selections.reason: Gaffalione/Maker. 4th last out, capable of improvement.

selections.name: Party Shaker
selections.reason: With scratches of #2 and #4, becomes the heavy favorite. Irad Ortiz. Consistent 70+ speed figures.

selections.name: It's Only Words
selections.reason: Speed figures (61-73) make her the logical second choice.

selections.name: Evanora
selections.reason: 2nd two starts back. Can hit the board.

selections.name: Girvin Star
selections.reason: Form has tailed off but fits on back class.

selections.name: Elenique
selections.reason: Strong 2nd last out with an 81 speed figure. The one to beat.

selections.name: Lion Lake (ire)
selections.reason: Gaffalione/Walsh. Consistent speed figures (83 last out).

selections.name: Academia
selections.reason: Chad Brown/Irad Ortiz. Layoff runner with upside.

selections.name: Pan Pan
selections.reason: Johnny V/Saffie Joseph. 82 speed figure last out on dirt, switches to turf.

danger_horse.name: Academia
danger_horse.reason: Connections are deadly with layoff runners.

selections.name: Blast Radius
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz. Cuts back to 7f where he ran a 92 speed figure two starts back. Prime contender.

selections.name: Accelerate Me
selections.reason: On a 3-race win streak. Form is impeccable.

selections.name: Tshiebwe
selections.reason: Won last out with an 80 speed figure. Solid.

selections.name: Sneak Preview
selections.reason: 2nd to Tshiebwe last out. In the mix.

danger_horse.name: Accelerate Me
danger_horse.reason: Hard to bet against a horse on a winning streak.

selections.name: Muffin Music
selections.reason: Wesley Ward trained sprinter. 2nd in a $150k race last out. Speed 74.

selections.name: Chucky's Ride
selections.reason: 3rd in AOC $86k last out, finishing ahead of key rivals here.

selections.name: Golden Beach
selections.reason: Gaffalione. Closing 4th last out with an 80 speed figure.

selections.name: Tululo
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz. 6th last out but had trouble. Can rebound.

danger_horse.name: Chucky's Ride
danger_horse.reason: Beat the favorite in their last meeting.

selections.name: Fraudster
selections.reason: Todd Pletcher / Johnny V. Cuts back from a mile (Speed 81) to 5f. Should be flying late.

selections.name: Mermaid
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz. 3rd in MSW $70k last out. Consistent.

selections.name: Horsing Around
selections.reason: Had significant trouble ('steadied 3x') last out and still ran well. Value play.

selections.name: Undercover Agent
selections.reason: Casse / Zayas. Solid form at Woodbine/Ellis.

danger_horse.name: Horsing Around
danger_horse.reason: Trip trouble last out masks true ability.

selections.reason: Highest speed rating (98) and won last out.
